thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 170 of 3757
thread.title: Jessica

author: Jessica
title: Jessica
text: I have become addicted to this website. I have such a love for books and this definitely fuels that. I've ordered from Thriftbooks too many times to count and have always had a great experience. The prices are fantastic and the free shipping is even better! I've never had to wait a full week typically to start getting my orders, most of the books I order tend to come from different locations. Keep it up and I'll always come back for more!
